title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting a dataset.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. To reproduce this issue, add a table report item without setting the dataset. Then try to create a new table group. The user should be able to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting a dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is shown and the user is able to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
